levels.description:
After ignition, begins Carnevale, periodically dealing Arts damage to all allied and enemy units within range.
<@ba.vup>Scorchy Charge</>: Attacks deal an additional <@ba.vup>50%</> ATK as Burn damage.

After ignition, begins Carnevale, periodically dealing Arts damage to all allied and enemy units within range.
<@ba.vup>Chilly Charge</>: Attacks inflict Cold on the target, lasting for <@ba.vup>4</>s.

After ignition, begins Carnevale, periodically dealing Arts damage to all allied and enemy units within range.
<@ba.vup>Freaky Charge</>: Allied and enemy units within range gain up to <@ba.vup>+50</> ASPD Tenacity (reaches maximum when missing 70% HP).

After ignition, begins Carnevale, periodically dealing Arts damage to all allied and enemy units within range.
<@ba.vup>Lazy Charge</>: Allied and enemy units within range are inflicted with <@ba.vup>-70</> ASPD, and enemy units have <@ba.vup>-70%</> Movement Speed.
